metadata.title: CVE-2024-25583 on Ubuntu Pro FIPS-updates 18.04 LTS (bionic) - medium
metadata.description: A crafted response from an upstream server the recursor has been configuredto forward-recurse to can cause a Denial of Service in the Recursor. Thedefault configuration of the Recursor does not use recursive forwarding andis not affected.

criterions.comment: pdns-recursor package in bionic is affected and may need fixing.
